description: The ongoing construction of a friendship alongside a building.
title: Under Construction
n_1: Bob and Jill review blueprints at a bustling construction site.
c1_1: Imagine the view from the top floor once we’re done.
c2_1: I’d rather imagine us finishing on time.
n_2: Amid the chaos, they share a moment of laughter over a shared lunch.
c1_2: I’ve got a joke for you.
c2_2: Is it finished or under construction like our project?
n_3: The setting sun casts long shadows over the half-built structure.
c1_3: Seriously, I’m working on the punchline.
c2_3: Just like everything else here, huh?
n_4: Under the stars, they lay the last brick for the day, a symbol of progress.
c1_4: Tomorrow, we’ll build more than just buildings.
c2_4: We’re also building a great team.
